    Assignment 1: Step Detection Try it Yourself!

    HINF5300

    This package documents any code and assignments for the HealthInformatics5300 course at Northeastern University.

    Installation

    You can install the development version of HINF5300 from GitHub with:

    # install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("TinasheMTapera/HINF5300")

    Assignment 1: Step Detection

    This assignment was demonstrating how to detect steps from an accelerometer embedded in a mobile device. The notebook for the assignment is located at vignette("assignment1"):

    library(HINF5300)
library(dplyr)
## basic example code

steps_df <- detect_steps(system.file("extdata", "acce.csv", package = "HINF5300"))
steps_df %>%
  summarise(n_steps = sum(!is.na(step)))
#> # A tibble: 1 × 1
#>   n_steps
#>     <int>
#> 1      47
